name: Daggerang
description:
A game made by Malte Große and Maximilian Georg for the 3rd Metroidvania Month Game Jam.

You are a thief and your goal is to find the mighty Daggerang.

Controls for XBox controller:

  • Move: Left Stick
  • Jump: A
  • Attack/Pickpocket: X
  • Aim Daggerang: Right Stick
  • Throw/Teleport to Daggerang: Right Trigger
  • Recall Daggerang: Right Button

Additional controls:

  • End Game: ESC
  • Restart Game: R
